bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to John W. Kerr, August 4, 1917

div1.p: Carter encloses his field notes about Camp Lee.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to John W. Kerr, August 4, 1917
div1.opener:
/LC
OFFICE OF
MEDICAL OFFICER IN CHARGE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
UNITED STATES
PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
BALTIMORE, MD.
August 4, 1917.
Assistant Surgeon General J. W. Kerr,
U.S. Public Health Service,
Washington, D. C.
Sir:
div1.p:
I am enclosing field notes and blue print belonging
to the Camp Lee Report. To be filed with them
div1.closer:
Respectfully, Assistant Surgeon General. 21 enclosures. The blue print is not enclosed as
it has not been completed. I will send it as soon
as I get it. The originals is are one with the Med. Of-
ficer of the Camp & one with the Va. State Board
My copy is with the latter for comparison.
Carter
